name: Help Bro!
description:
Not playable prototype of the "Help Bro!" GGJ game project.

TL;DR: Players only see each other in dark scene (Player1's screen follows Player2 position, Player2's screen follows Player1 position). Players should use voice communicate and finish the level.

Controls:

  • W = Climb up
  • A = Move left
  • D = Move right
  • Space = Jump
  • E = Use / Activate
Working Title

Help Bro!

Elevator Pitch

We're developing a 2 players co-operative puzzle platformer game with a minimal colored linear theme. It's gameplay is strongly coop-driven and based on the communication. Players should communicate with each other for complete levels.

Concept Overview
  • Genre: Co-op Platformer Game / Puzzle
  • Target Audience:
    • Age: 8+
    • Gender: Any
  • Monetization: None
  • License: Free Software
  • Platforms & System Requirements:
    • Windows
    • GNU/Linux (after release)
Theme and Setting

"Help Bro!" is a co-op platformer game set in a colored linear theme. Players (2) wake up alone in a dark room with a talkie-walkie. These walkies are the only way to communicate with other player. The game features many puzzles in levels. Need to assist other players with walkies. Players should help each other to succeed before time runs out.

Timeline
  • Game Jam Prototype
  • Very-early prototype of the game. It contains only base mechanics such as puzzles, character physics, and some levels.
